title: Russia says it foiled assassination attempts on top media figures
description: A Moscow court issued criminal charges against seven people in connection with alleged plot to kill two journalists.

title: Sudan army returns for talks in Jeddah as war enters fourth month
description: Army representatives return to Saudi Arabia for talks with paramilitary rivals, according to reports.

title: Lionel Messi signs contract with Inter Miami through 2025
description: Inter Miami will introduce the Argentina superstar on Sunday night at its stadium in Fort Lauderdale.

title: UN says Syria cross-border aid conditions ‘unacceptable’
description: UN raises concerns with Damascus's terms for aid deliveries via Bab al-Hawa to rebel-held areas in northwest Syria.

title: Sweden protester abandons plan to burn Torah and Bible
description: Ahmad Alloush says his intention was to denounce those who burn sacred books such as the Quran in the Nordic country.

title: Israel’s Benjamin Netanyahu admitted to hospital, his office says
description: Netanyahu, 73, is undergoing medical assessments at Sheba Medical Center and is in stable condition, his office says.

title: Unseeded Vondrousova makes history, beats Jabeur to win Wimbledon
description: Tunisia's Jabeur, the 2022 runner-up, was bidding to become the first Arab player to win a Grand Slam title.

title: Extreme heat sweeps the world from Europe to the US and Japan
description: Italian health ministry issues a red alert for 16 cities including Rome, Bologna and Florence amid soaring temperatures.

title: Remembering those who stood against the attempted coup in Türkiye
description: Seven years ago, Turkish people defied tanks, guns and bombs to protect their nation's democratic future.

title: Pope approves Shanghai bishop appointment after the fact
description: Vatican says Francis accepted China's unilateral appointment for the 'greater good' of the faithful in Shanghai.

title: Italy air transport strike grounds hundreds of flights
description: Some 1,000 domestic and international flights were cancelled as a result of the strike by ground crew.

title: China vs US: Competing interests, conflicting narratives
description: China and the US say they want to improve communications, but mutual suspicion runs deep. Plus, Kenya’s TV evangelists.

title: South Korea’s President Yoon in Ukraine to meet Zelenskyy
description: The surprise trip came after Yoon attended a NATO summit in Lithuania and visited Poland this week.

title: Ministry issues warning after oilfield closures in Libya
description: The fields were shut in protest over the kidnapping of former finance minister Faraj Bumatari.

title: Dimie Ogoina: Is mpox health emergency over in the Global South?
description: The Nigerian scientist who diagnosed the first recent mpox case discusses whether the health emergency is really over.

title: Heavy rain in S Korea kills at least 7 in landslides, flooding
description: Torrential rainfall triggered landslides and temporary power cuts in 13 towns and cities overnight.

title: How can global hunger be reduced?
description: Rise in hunger 'stalled' globally in 2022, but remains elevated in some parts of the world.

title: Ons Jabeur: Tunisia’s ‘Minister of Happiness’ brings hope and joy
description: Fans say Jabeur's journey to the top, her warmth towards opponents and gleaming smile set her apart from the rest.

title: Life as a resistance fighter in Jenin: ‘Only death can stop us’
description: A resistance fighter in embattled Jenin talks to Al Jazeera about his unwavering dedication to fight occupation.

title: How Israel weaponises museums to erase Palestinian existence
description: Physical violence isn't the only way Israel tries to deny Palestinian existence. Museums are tools of terror, too.

title: Colombian children who survived 40 days in jungle leave hospital
description: The children, aged one through 13, have recovered physically and will remain under Colombia's child protection services.

title: Zelenskyy says Russia ‘investing everything’ to stop Ukraine push
description: Ukrainian president says monitoring security situation in Belarus where Wagner fighters are training Belarusian troops.

title: Alleged Russia agent pleads not guilty to smuggling US tech, arms
description: Vadim Konoshchenok accused of multiple crimes for smuggling of US-made semiconductors and ammunition to Russia.

title: US to send F-16 fighter jets to Gulf amid Iran shipping tensions
description: US defence official said Washington considering options amid growing aggression by Russian planes in skies over Syria.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 507
description: As the conflict enters its 507th day, these are the main developments.

title: DNA from pizza crust leads to arrest in US Gilgo Beach murders
description: Prosecutors have charged architect Rex Heuermann with murder in three of the 11 unsolved deaths on Long Island.

title: Fear and voting in Cambodia’s one-horse election race
description: Seventeen parties registered for election alongside PM Hun Sen's party, but the vote is almost impossible for him lose.
